product_name: The North Face Light Zip Neck Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A great next-to-skin layer for cool-weather actvities, the Light Zip-Neck long-underwear top from The North Face can also be worn alone when your adventures warm up a bit. Moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles to dramatically improve dry time. Stretch fabric ensures full range of motion; half-length zipper ventilates instantly. The North Face Light crew neck offers a relaxed fit that skims the body. Closeout.
short_description: A great next-to-skin layer for cool-weather actvities, the Light Zip-Neck long-underwear top from The North Face can also be worn alone when your adventures warm up a bit.
